page.title: 16RECREATION FACILITIES
page.content: {FACILITIES}AVAILABLE FOR SPORT AND RECREATION ARE EXCELLENT. THE CHOICE INCLUDES{FISHING, GOLF,FOOTBALL,RUGBY, {CURLING AND SKATING.}IN AN AREA POPULAR WITH BOTH LOCALS AND TOURISTS THERE IS AMPLE TO CHOOSE FROM. IF YOUR SPORT COMES AT A LEISURELY PACE THEN {FISHING IN THE RIVER NESS, }FOR SALMON OR TROUT MAY BE FOR YOU.IF NOT THEN{18 {HOLES AT TORVEAN GOLF }MIGHT SUIT YOU. LET'S NOT FORGET THE {19TH HOLE {I.E.LOCH NESS HOUSE HOTEL,}DEPENDING ON YOUR IDEA OF RECREATION. ALTERNATIVES INCLUDE {RUGBY AT A {FLOOD-LIT PITCH}ADJACENT TO A POPULAR {SOCIAL CLUB. FOOTBALL }AT PITCHES ARE BOOKED FROM THE COUNCIL AS ARE { {ATHLETICS, }AT THE NEW QUEENS PARK RUNNING TRACK,{SKATING AND CURLING }AT THE ICE RINK. AIMED MORE AT THE CHILDREN IS WHIN PARK,PROVIDING { {BOATING AND MINI-GOLF. }
